name: BlackQuest
description:
The world of the game will be centered on a dungeon where the player will play a knight.
The goal is to reach the exit of the dungeon but enemies will stand in its way.
It will be able to recover life thanks to the lives left by the enemies.
In addition, there will be chests that contain a key and it will have to be used to open with a door, traps that will have to be solved by eliminating enemies in the room and switches that will open a door.
Enemies will be represented by monsters such as skeletons, goblins, giant mushrooms and mutant bats as well as a boss at the end of the dungeon.

Some enemies will be able to launch projectiles, and others will patrol.
Also, there will be enemies who can act only on their own territory. Finally, the player can hurt the enemies, that is, he can repel the enemies and put in a state of paralysis and vice versa.

PREPARE TO DIE!

Instructions - How to play:

  • ←  : Left
  • ↓ : Down
  • → : Right
  • ↑: Up
  • SPACE : Attack
  • Enter : Interact (door/chest)

Credits :

Graphics : King ng, Luiz melo, Armm1998, Kronovi, 0x72, Brackeys

Audio : Youfulca, Zapslat

Developer : Ganeche SIVASANKAR.
